long_description.value:
Instantly add step-by-step solution articles to your zendesk sell replys. No uploads. No screenshot editing.  Assist your customers in real time.

Creating solution articles is extremely painful and time consuming. A 20 step article takes 1-2 hours to make. Take a screenshot, edit it, upload to your Zendesk guide...rinse and repeat. Precious time wasted. Worst of all it’s your most valuable employee, a power user, thats tasked with doing this.

What if I told you iorad could speed this process -10X. That’s right. That same solution article could be done in minutes.
long_description.title: app long description

installation_instructions.value: Click install button from Zendesk Marketplace
